channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- WP Word Count
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- WP Word Count

item.title: CVE-2022-3408|2024-08-03T01:07:06.513Z -- unknown -- wp%20word%20count
item.description: The WP Word Count WordPress plugin through 3.2.3 does not sanitise and escape some of its settings, which could allow high privilege users such as admin to perform Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when unfiltered_html is disallowed.
